message: Welcome to America. A clown has been voted into office so therefore, Putin and Kim Jong have replaced this yellow bellied idiot by force. We will now be United State of the East side and the US of the West side. You will not cross the wall the Mexicans built and were then shot for crossing the border. If you had family living in opposite directions, to bad. Your income will be taken and we will have food lines of contaminated water and slop available for 100 people per day, only. If we hear you object or if anyone tells us you may have said something against our new gov., you will be shot on sight. Shortly, we will be coming to your home to forcibly collect your guns, any jewelry of value, art work, vehicles etc........now get yourself back to work for us or you will be shot now. Bahaha, TRUTH!!!!!

, do you realize you can debate without throwing insults? Everyone has a right to their opinions. Free will, I may not like the actions of the person you vote for but I won't call you names! I might bring up shady deals or the growing list of mysterious deaths surrounding her, but I won't call you names! I will add this, Democrats say whatever shady deals etc that Hillary has been involved in, she wasn't charged!!! Then turn around and bring up things against Trump that he wasn't charged with!!! Locker room talk, where's the entire conversation? What was said before and after? You can't take 1 thing out of a conversation with out it and make an informed decision! All of this is just a distraction. Taking our attention away from real issues. Who threatens to sue a state in the middle of a Hurricane? Why Hillary Clinton does. Not saying either candidate is squeaky clean, but to deny that Hillary has been caught on camera in lie after lie is ludicrous. There are plenty of records of Hillarys harassment of Bill's victims, but hey let's make him first man so they can harass some more. Smh
